text: Tatiana Ariza Díaz (born 21 February 1991) is a Colombian international footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Elpides Karditsas. She was part of the Colombia women's national football team at the 2012 Summer Olympics. Her twin sister Natalia Ariza is also a footballer. ==References== == External links == * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bogotá Category:Colombian women's footballers Category:Olympic footballers of Colombia Category:Footballers at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Footballers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Colombia women's international footballers Category:Colombian expatriate women's footballers Category:2011 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:2015 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Austin Peay Lady Govs soccer players Category:Elpides Karditsas players Category:Footballers at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Twin sportspeople Category:Twin people from Colombia
title: Tatiana Ariza
